channel.title: Looking for staff, admin spots open. [Coder,Banner maker,Forum manager]
channel.description:
I am in need of some experienced staff members.
I need a
+ = needed - = not-needed
-Hoster +Coder [I have a few good 'backups' so if you get stuck, tell me on what] +Banner maker <Really needed -Forum Manager
Use this format
[code] [B]Name:[/B][I]What you like to be called[/I] [B]Experience:[/B][I]How long have you been -profession here-[/I] [B]What your applying for:[/B][I]Forum manager, Banner maker, Coder[/I] [B]How much are you on:[/B][I]Hours a day[/I] [/code]

item.title: Looking for staff, admin spots open. [Coder,Banner maker,Forum manager]
item.dc:creator: @werefaw1 werefaw1
item.description:
@werefaw1 wrote:

i can make a banner, if u like.
im not doing it for staff spot, lol, because im not gonna join the server, im just bored
ill make the banner tomorrow. just post wut u want on it

I’ll be a backup coder, helping the coders with their problems, but I won’t actually code. I would be banner maker, but my power supply in my computer blew out, and it had my photoshop on it, and I can’t get it fixed until Tuesday, so meh :
[/quote]

I have a few ‘backup’ coders.
If i dont have a banner by tuesday can i pm you?[/quote]
Sure. And if any of your coders need help, pm me
